Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Sanflowery Hotel Guangzhou in Guangzhou (Haizhu), you'll be close to Yingzhou Ecological Park and Guangdong Science Center. This hotel is within the vicinity of Whampoa Military Academy and Lingnan Impression Park.

Rooms
Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 85 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring private spa tubs and LCD televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while DVD players and cable programming provide entertainment.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy the recreation opportunities such as a fitness center or make use of other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle that operates within 13 km.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms.
